abstract.t: RFC 3580 provides guidelines for the use of the Remote Authentication Dialin User Service (RADIUS) within IEEE 802 local area networks (LANs). This document proposes additional attributes for use within IEEE 802 networks, as well as clarifying the usage of the EAP-Key- Name attribute (updating RFC 4072) and the Called-Station-Id attribute (updating RFC 3580). The attributes defined in this document are usable both within RADIUS and Diameter.
